thread.title: Apple Showcases Watch Apps With Short, Sweet New Ads
thread.title_full: Apple Showcases Watch Apps With Short, Sweet New Ads

author: Expert
title: Apple Showcases Watch Apps With Short, Sweet New Ads
text:
Tech , Technology TC Expert 
Today, Apple dropped a trio of 15 second ads showing off all of the great third-party apps available on the Apple Watch. Specifically, the ads focus on the travel, music and fitness apps available now for the device. These ads arrive as Apple looks to the fall launch of watchOS 2 and the native applications that the new OS is capable of supporting. These ads are likely the first step in aâ€¦ Read More
